SEARCH
Package gl.view

Class GLView

java.lang.Object
gl.view.GLView
public class GLView extends Object
The GLView class is responsible for creating and displaying the main user interface of the Game of Life application. It includes the game board, menu bar, header, footer, and handles user interactions.

    • GLView

      public GLView(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, int board_width, int board_height)
      Constructs a GLView instance with the specified primary stage and board dimensions.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - The primary stage of the application.
      board_width - The width of the game board.
      board_height - The height of the game board.
